name: Soul Dealer
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:
- You control a dice board, where you can flip, rotate, roll, and swap dice using the actions on the right of the board. The dice with the red borders while add to your attack, the number with the blue borders will add to your defense, and the number with the yellow border will decide which target you attack. You can see what enemies are going to do each round by hovering over the icon that is under them.

SOUL DEALER

Roll a good deal on a soul eater to gain your power!

This reaper gain his power with the dices on the soul eater's back.
